steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 5-2011. A 65-year-old 
man with hematuria after treatment for prostate cancer.
Kaufman DS(1), Zietman AL, Dahl DM, Harisinghani MG, Wu CL.

Author information:
(1)Division of Hematology–Oncology, Massachusetts General Hospital, and 
Department of Medicine, Harvard Medical School, Boston, USA.
